thread.title: Drivers play football as lorries parked along M20
thread.title_full: Drivers play football as lorries parked along M20 | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Drivers play football as lorries parked along M20
text:
Lorry drivers can be seen playing football as hundreds of vehicles are parked along the M20 in Kent.
Operation Stack continues for miles on what is thought to be the UK's hottest day of the year.
Operation Stack remains in place due to industrial action in Calais on what is predicted to be the hottest day of the year so far Credit: PA Wire Travellers on both sides of the Channel are facing further disruption as a strike looks set to keep the Port of Calais closed until Thursday Credit: PA Wire Last updated Wed 1 Jul 2015 Read more 54 updates Port of Dover reopens but Operation Stack remains in place Travel Dover
